content.rendered:
learn

Our training centres

From theory to practice

In Europe, in Africa, in the Middle East, online: Bioforce is available and accessible to anyone, anywhere.

Lyon, France

The 2,700 sqm premises, awarded the French High Environmental Quality standard, are home to our regional training centre for Europe where we offer diploma and open training courses to over 500 future humanitarians every year.

Find out more about this centre

Dakar, Senegal

In a modern, 1,500 sqm, four-storey building, our regional training centre for Africa has hosted over 400 people a year since 2017, each eager to fulfil their career aspirations in the humanitarian sector through diploma and open training courses.

Find out more about this centre

Amman, Jordan

The Middle East region’s very first water, sanitation and hygiene master’s will be launched at this university in September 2020.

Read more about our partner in the Middle East

E-learning platform

Bioforce’s e-learning courses are run through our BioMoodle online platform, with individual monitoring provided by your trainer.

En savoir plus
